title: Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP Project Data
summary: This article performs a spatio-temporal gap analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP project data, utilizing various datasets and survey records to identify gaps in knowledge for marine species observations.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the article focuses on 'Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis' and uses 'survey data' and 'datasets', directly addressing 'Spatio Temporal' and 'Survey data'.
